page.description: Fires when the updates to the cached files have been succesfully downloaded.
page.discussion: Fires after an updated version of the cache has been downloaded. Your code should execute:

section.description: This will reload the page using the new files in the application cache.
section.note: If you do not include this code the user will not see the new version of the UX component until the *[NEXT]* time they load the page.

section.title: Example
section.example: //reload the page so that the new version of the UX component is shown window.location.reload();
